content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production Line (x=1-3, y=1-3.5)
Consists of:
- Two furnaces at (1,1) and (3,1)
- Two burner inserters at (1.5,2.5) and (3.5,2.5)
- Two wooden chests at (1.5,3.5) and (3.5,3.5) containing iron plates

### Copper Plate Production Line (x=2-4.5, y=7-9.5)
Consists of:
- Two furnaces at (2,7) and (4,7)
- Two burner inserters at (2.5,8.5) and (4.5,8.5)
- Two wooden chests at (2.5,9.5) and (4.5,9.5)
- Additional burner inserter at (3.5,9.5) connecting the chests

### Copper Cable Production Line (x=11.5-17.5, y=11.5-14.5)
Consists of:
- Assembling machine at (14.5,14.5) producing copper cable
- Input chest at (14.5,11.5)
- Output chest at (11.5,14.5) containing copper cables
- Multiple burner inserters managing material flow
- Additional chests at (17.5,14.5) for logistics

### Electronic Circuit Production Line (x=21.5, y=11.5-15.5)
Consists of:
- Assembling machine at (21.5,15.5)
- Input chests at (21.5,11.5) and (21.5,12.5)
- Burner inserter at (21.5,13.5)

### Power Generation System (x=-5.5 to 15.5, y=26.5-40.5)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump at (2.5,35.5) extracting water
- Boiler at (7.0,35.5) heating water
- Steam engine at (13.5,35.5) generating power
- Extensive pipe network connecting water and steam
- Electricity distribution network with multiple power poles

### Transport System
Multiple belt groups connecting various production lines:
- Belt network from (2.5,8.5) to (4.5,8.5)
- Extended belt system from (4.5,8.5) to (13.5,10.5)
- Additional belt networks managing material flow between production areas

ERROR TIPS

### Errors related to fuel management
- Ensure coal is available in inventory before attempting to insert it into machines
- Check fuel levels in burner inserters and boilers regularly

### Resource shortage errors
- Ensure proper supply of raw materials (copper plates, iron plates) to assembling machines
- Monitor input chests to maintain continuous production

### Connection errors
- Verify fluid connections between offshore pumps, boilers, and steam engines
- Ensure proper pipe connections for water and steam flow

### Production bottleneck issues
- Monitor chest capacities to prevent overflow
- Ensure proper inserter placement and direction for efficient material transfer
